ygData.subject: Dewboy
ygData.msgSnippet: First thing, DON T RESPOND TO THIS EMAIL, ANYONE. (ANYONE MEANS YOU AS WELL DEWBOY.) Except for maybe comments from the other council members. I shouldn t say

First thing, DON'T RESPOND TO THIS EMAIL, ANYONE. 
(ANYONE MEANS YOU AS WELL DEWBOY.) Except for maybe 
comments from the other council members. I shouldn't say don't 
reply, cause I don't mind if it's private, and ONLY if it's private. 
Occasional OOC's are encouraged, but spamming them is frowned 
upon.

Dewboy, if you send another pointless OOC then I'll rip off your 
fingers one by one. (j/k... but maybe not) I just thought we'd gotten 
the OOC posting down to a respectable minimum. (Megan's post 
about her b-day was ok, it's a birthday for gawdssake! and btw, 
Megan isn't new, you must have missed her posts when you 
weren't away) 13 of the last 18 messages (when i started typing 
this one) were you writing OOC's, and that has to stop. There is a 
messageboard on the nbwrpg site, use that to spam crap. Do you 
have a private email, (other than that hotmail address) that you 
acctually check? Cause most of this can easily be put into a 
private message sent. I'm not sure why Cyberwolf is acctually 
standing up for you... you try too hard to make other people angry 
at you. You wonder why people wont stand up for you, or come 
within 20 feet, but that is mostly your fault... you seem to push 
them away (most likely unintentionally). An appropriate anaolgy for 
your situation would be: You are standing on a single file bridge 
accross a deep gorge, everyone else is walking either before you or 
behind you, and every so often, to everyone elses horror, you start 
to jump up and down, effectively making them willing to cut off your 
legs. Your alliance story is asking too much, so don't count on it. 
We can probably let you post in a more spaced out time frame. Is 
there any reason in particular that you can't post during 

1. If you ship has CR chambers it is a base(can cannot be moved). 
If your ship can hold more than three bots, it is a base(can cannot 
be moved).

2. There is not currect criteria for a ship, but if you bring in 
something ridiculous, like bringing in a medium sized weapon 
outfitted cruiser manned by a single bot, for example. That would 
probably have to re revamped.

3. Hold the Rocak idea, don't post anything about it cause the 
council will discuss it. In addition, send us an email privately 
describing what it is you want to do.

GTG, I'll be back later. =)
